Moteur Multi-blog multi-utilisateur multilingue.

Version: 0.9

Package b2evo: Accueil · Installation · Blogs · Admin · En ligne: Manuel · Support

Bienvenue!

b2evolution is a PHP multilingual multiuser multiblog engine. You will find complete information on the official b2evolution website.

Mise en route rapide:

You can setup b2evolution in a just a few minutes. Just follow the instructions matching your situation:

  • Nouveaux utilisateurs: installing b2evolution from scratch
  • Utilisateurs existants de b2evolution: upgrading from a previous version of b2evolution
  • Utilisateurs de Cafélog/b2: upgrading from b2 version 0.6.x
